definitions: in a way that causes anger or another strong reaction, especially deliberately

examples.text: she argued provocatively that business owners should put profit before passion
a column provocatively titled "Greed is bad.”

shortDefinitions: in way that causes anger or another strong reaction

definitions: in a manner intended to arouse sexual desire or interest

examples.text: you don't need to dress provocatively to attract attention
they dance provocatively in skimpy clothes

shortDefinitions: in manner intended to arouse sexual desire or interest
